Projects

A Computer Vision Based Approach for Automated Traffic Management as a Smart City Solution

https://github.com/shubhiigupta/automated-traffic-management

Proposes the use of adaptable lanes dividers for traffic management using real time video analysis. Uses image processing and computer visions techniques for vehicle speed, density calculation and road detection.

Automated Car Damage Assessment

https://github.com/shubhiigupta/automated-traffic-management

Using convolutional neural networks, the model is capable of validating specifics on car damage from user submitted images.

Visual Question Answering

https://github.com/shubhiigupta/visual-question-answering

Application of Natural Language Processing in Computer Vision. Uses the easy-vqa dataset to train a VQA model that combines image and text features to answer open-ended questions.

Mosaic Satellite Image Stitching

https://github.com/shubhiigupta/satellite-image-stitching

Application of Big Data in image processing. Using Apache Hadoop MapReduce with OpenCV for stitching of observatory tile images for object detection and recognition.
